tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  INSPIRATIONAL  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Impressive person. Provided due concern for student condition and learning. Helpful guidance. Ineffective writing anxiety was eased with some individualized attention. She is what one would expect from a considerate teacher/professor. Rigid evaluator. Grading is reasonable, fair. No handout A in her class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She is a decent teacher

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I took some issue with her telling me what affect and effect mean or the difference between its and it\'s. Obviously, they were typos. Basically, she\'s old school. I felt like I was in 5th grade again. Easy A, sure, but was it enjoyable? Did I learn anything from her that I couldn\'t have learned on my own time w/out instruction? The answer is no.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Fair grader but doesn\'t always stick to assignment criteria. It\'s to the student\'s advantage but can be frustrating: we had to write a problem/solution paper in our program but she told me "the world is your major" & to go outside my program for a topic. My problem/solution was "you could read Harry Potter this way but read it this way" A paper.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Prof. Olea is always there if you need help or clarity. She will not come to you to see if you need assistance, but will help or work with you if needed. She understands most students are working parents and can only dedicate so much time to school work, therefore she pretty easily.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ  SO MANY PAPERS
comments: Professor Olea is an extremely tough grader. Her expectations are clear, but its a tough class. If you follow the sysiblius you will pass. She expects a lot from her students, but she wants you to pass.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Professor Olea is an amazing teacher and woman. I have taken two classes offered by her--College 300 and Russian Literature. She is passionate about Russian politics, history, and literature. Thus, I learned way more about Russia than I expected when I signed on for Russian literature. All knowledge was beneficial for me! Thank you Mary!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  GET READY TO READ
comments: It is a literature class, you will be reading. Professor Olea is a very lenient grader though, and feedback given on the assignments was clear and thoughtful. Forums were good; not dry, empty, and obviously forced like some classes. Would be happy to take another class with her.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: The Professor gave clear expectations for assignments and feedback concerning coursework. The minimum word requirements for forumsassignments were reasonable. Grades where posted weekly so that any mark downs on an assignment could be clarified before the next assignment due date.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She is very passionate about Russian Literature and know\'s the subject well through travel and literature. Very friendly and willing to help. She seemed somewhat distant when it came to the course but stated she had other classes she was grading. Can be a bit reading intensive but not a hard grader, often overlooking format errors.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Great class to take for the mechanics of writing a great paper. I did feel overwhelmed by the final paper but did get a good grade on it.

comments: What a wonderful professor. She has an amazing sense of humor and is very fair. Her grading is fair and quick to leave constructive feedback. I would take her course again anytime. Great professor.

comments: Awesome Teacher. Easy Grader.

comments: Loved this professor. She was very helpful and the class followed the syllabus exactly. Lots of reading and a fair amount of writing but if you stay on top of it you\'re sure to get an A.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Great teacher and she was a fast grader. It\'s a pretty easy class if you put in the work.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Really nice professor! I loved Russian lit., but hated that the forums often had so little to do with the readings, which were soooo long. Submitting assignments to the forum and as an assignment kind of sucked. But her feedback was helpful. I would def. take her again.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Get ready to read (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Inspirational (2)  Tough Grader (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Amazing course with an amazing instructor. This was my final course before finishing my degree and I really wish I would have taken it first, not last. The instructor is very supportive, and teaches you how to do things right, instead of just scolding you for doing things wrong. Best instructor throughout my entire degree experience.
